html:
Artist Of The Month April 2025

BLEED FROM WITHIN Walks You Through Their New Album, Zenith

Take a deep dive!

test

We caught up with Bleed From Within – Metal Injection's Artist Of The Month for April – for a track by track delivery of their new album, Zenith, out now! Follow along with the band as they explain each amazing track, with behind the scenes stories and anecdotes only here on Metal Injection!

Bleed From Within's new record Zenith is out now and available here!
